title: 爬行者破坏地形
author: gyf
txt_content: RT   有的图里爬行者不会破坏地形 怎么设置的啊

replies.author: a360015305
replies.txt_content:
游戏中按/
输入gamerule mobGriefing false
注意大小写

replies.author: mayier318
replies.txt_content:
可通过Ess插件修改
下个中文版的 设置里面看

replies.author: hukk
replies.txt_content:
游戏中按/
输入gamerule mobGriefing false
注意大小写
